Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of 3st-m-3ḫbit with black painted detail: a lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced eyes and crossed arms in relief holding two hoes; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a seed-basket.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Walter L Lawson
